front.title: Metrics for the Evaluation of Congestion Control Mechanisms

abstract.t: This document discusses the metrics to be considered in an evaluation of new or modified congestion control mechanisms for the Internet. This includes metrics for the evaluation of new transport protocols, of proposed modifications to TCP, of application-level congestion control, and of Active Queue Management (AQM) mechanisms in the router. This document is the first in a series of documents aimed at improving the models that we use in the evaluation of transport protocols.
